definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
famous watch (i.e. expensive brand of wristwatch)
to set or synchronize a watch
to run the meter (in a taxi)

pinyin: Ou1 mi3 jia1 Biao3 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: The crown is decorated with a stunning black onyx cabochon.
sentences.chinese: 錶冠以一顆華麗的凸圓形黑縞瑪瑙裝飾。

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奧巴馬錶示他86歲的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: Often, government workers are paid according to a salary scale.
sentences.chinese: 政府員工拿薪水每每是根據一個薪水錶。

sentences.english: Every two days, set the alarm for just 10minutes earlier.
sentences.chinese: 每隔兩天，將你的鬧錶往前調個10分鐘。

sentences.english: Politeness militated against this opinion being expressed.
sentences.chinese: 禮貌對錶達的意見有影響。

sentences.english: they're not making direct eye-contact, they're looking at their watch.
sentences.chinese: 他們避免跟你的眼神交流，不時地看看錶。

sentences.english: Yan in a low-key source said.
2 do not operate in water {brand name} watch button and adjust the crown of the table.
sentences.chinese: 請勿在水中操作法蘭克穆勒手錶的按鈕和調校錶冠。

sentences.english: The base plate and the surface place are all adhered to the inner core separately.
sentences.chinese: 所述底板和錶板分別和內芯粘合。

sentences.english: My watch is five seconds slow.
The basic function of the Cantonese final particles is assisting the intonation to convey moods.
sentences.chinese: 廣州話句末語氣助詞的基本功能是輔助句調錶達語氣。

sentences.english: Only consider user tables for automatic table reorganization.
sentences.chinese: 僅對用戶表進行自動錶重組。

sentences.english: We invited some foreign friends to the show.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請了一些外國朋友來觀看錶演。

sentences.english: Here spring the surface water temperature of 33 degrees to 36 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的泉水錶面水溫在33度至36度之間。

sentences.english: After Mary was almost asleep, she realized that she had forgotten to set the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 馬利快睡着了之後才意識到忘記了設置鬧錶。

sentences.english: Music video by Tiziano Ferro performing Rojo Relativo.
sentences.chinese: 音樂錄像由提香鐵羅霍相對錶現。

neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
